title: Murud Beach
subtitle: Historic forts, wide sandy shores, and water sports adventure
overview: Murud Beach is a scenic and clean beach located in the Raigad district of Maharashtra. It is best known for the historic Murud-Janjira Fort that stands offshore and is accessible by boat.
The beach is popular for its long stretch of white sand, clear waters, and relatively calm waves, making it ideal for family outings, swimming, and watersports.
With coconut palms lining the coast and charming resorts nearby, Murud offers a perfect mix of history, relaxation, and coastal beauty.

highlights.title: Murud-Janjira Fort
highlights.description: Historic sea fort located off the coast, accessible by sailboats and known for its unconquered history.

highlights.title: Wide Sandy Shore
highlights.description: Clean, white-sand beach ideal for relaxing walks and family play.

highlights.title: Water Sports
highlights.description: Jet skiing, banana rides, and parasailing available during peak season.

highlights.title: Palm-lined Coast
highlights.description: Aesthetic coconut palm backdrop adds tropical charm.

geography.intro: Murud lies along the Konkan coast south of Alibaug in Raigad district. It is well connected and features a crescent-shaped beach fronting the Arabian Sea.

climate.description: Murud has a warm coastal tropical climate. Winters are pleasant, summers are hot, and monsoon brings heavy rains.

geography.conclusion: Murud's beach geography blends history, nature, and accessibility, making it a well-rounded coastal getaway.

activities.title: Boat Ride to Janjira Fort
activities.description: Experience a sailboat trip to the famous sea fort.
info: Includes fort entrance and guide options

activities.title: Water Sports
activities.description: Enjoy banana rides, jet skiing, and bumper boats on the beach.

activities.title: Sunset Photography
activities.description: Capture the iconic view of Janjira Fort with the sun setting in the backdrop.
info: Best view from the northern beach end

attractions.title: Murud-Janjira Fort
attractions.description: A majestic sea fort located 20 km from Kashid, famous for its stronghold history and architecture.

attractions.title: Phansad Wildlife Sanctuary
attractions.description: Lush forest reserve home to leopards, birds, and medicinal plants.

attractions.title: Datta Mandir Hill
attractions.description: Small hilltop temple offering panoramic views of the beach.

marineLife.intro: Murud’s beach features moderate marine biodiversity including shore fish, crabs, and occasional dolphins offshore.

items.title: Shore Fish
items.description: Small marine fish like mullet and anchovies are common near the beachline.

items.title: Crabs & Shells
items.description: Children can find tiny crabs and seashells during low tide.

items.title: Bird Watching
items.description: Seagulls, sandpipers, and kites are common around the beach and fort area.

conclusion: Murud’s clean waters and gentle waves support safe marine interaction.
The beach is not suited for diving but offers nature lovers plenty to observe.

howToReach.title: By Air
details: Nearest Airport: Mumbai (Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport)
From there, drive or take ferry to Alibaug and onward to Murud

howToReach.title: By Train
details: From Roha, taxis and buses available to Murud

howToReach.title: By Road
details: Approx. 150 km from Mumbai via Alibaug

howToReach.title: By Ferry
details: Ferries from Gateway of India to Alibaug (Mandwa Jetty)
Continue by road to Murud (~50 km)

bookingTips.description: Book in advance during long weekends and holidays
Avoid monsoon months for water activities
Private vehicle recommended for fort and nearby travel
